intro: Outsmart, outplay, and checkmate your way to victory!
description:
Get ready to challenge your mind and outsmart your opponent in CHESS UP! Checkmate with Friends, the ultimate board classic brought to life on Nintendo Switch™!

Play your way — whether you’re a beginner learning the ropes or a seasoned strategist aiming for checkmate perfection.

Game Modes:

Single Player: Test your skills against a smart AI opponent with adjustable difficulty — Easy, Medium, or Hard.

Multiplayer: Go head-to-head with a friend in a thrilling 1v1 match on a single console. Will you claim victory… or settle for a draw?

Choose your favorite board skin from three unique designs and make each match your own!

Sharpen your tactics, plan your moves, and prove your mastery — one checkmate at a time.

Think. Move. Win. CHESS UP!
